title: JetBrains Plugin 2.10.5 Performance Update
description: Improved file search performance, added new AI models, and fixed diagnostics downloading issues during file name changes in the JetBrains IDE integration.

title: Cursor 2.2 - Debug Mode & Visual Editor
description: Revolutionary update introducing Debug Mode with runtime logs, Visual Editor for web development, Multi-Agent Judging system, enhanced Plan Mode with Mermaid diagrams, and Pinned Chats feature.

community_feedback.quote: Since the latest update (approx Dec 11/12), the editor has become extremely laggy
AI chat constantly hanging and not completing, chats not starting properly

title: Claude Code 2.0.70 Release
description: Major update with Enter key for prompt suggestions, 3x memory improvement for large conversations, MCP tool wildcard support, and context window percentage display in status line.

community_feedback.quote: Anthropic just released Claude Code 2.0.70 with 13 CLI changes
Added Enter key to accept and submit prompt suggestions immediately
Fixed input clearing when processing queued commands
Fixed prompt suggestions overwriting your typed input

title: Windsurf Next 1.12.157 with GPT-5.1 Codex Max
description: Added 'GPT-5.1 Codex Max' model support, enhanced Tab autocomplete reliability, and introduced 'Promo' labels for new/discounted models across all platforms.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Code vs Cursor vs Windsurf: Which is the better AI code editor?
Windsurf is better managing large-scale coding tasks
